# influxdb-v2_scraper (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "influxdb-v2_scraper" "demo" {
    name = "Demo Scraper" 
    org_id = "org id"
    allow_insecure = true
	bucket_id = influxdb-v2_bucket.scraper_target.id
	url = "https://localhost:8086/metrics"
}
```
